Name: Kare wa Kanojo
About the game: Summer of Heisei period 9 (1997), you play as a young boy who just moved to a small village near Osaka. You will meet three girls in this new school. One of them keeps a really deep secret… What secret? Well, if you can decode the title, you’ll guess it… “There she he's” (can also be called “Kare wa Kanojo”, “KWK” or “彼は彼女”) is a free independent visual novel made in Ren’Py. The story changes depending of your choices and has 3 possible endings.
Meta Title: Kare wa Kanojo: Mar 27, 2019, JMF Games and Full Overview
